segments.text: I see the woman standing there, completely absorbed in her task of drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how she seems unaffected by the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to overflow, drenching the floor beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can hardly believe she hasn't noticed the puddle forming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is climbing dangerously on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will be before something inevitable happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, with her eager anticipation for a cookie, adds to the scene’s tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a beautiful day outside, and yet the mess inside contrasts sharply with that calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I shake my head at the oblivion of the adult in charge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only she could see what I see, all the risks waiting to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a recipe for disaster, and I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The combination of mischief and negligence feels almost tragic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting to alert her, but I remain a silent witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire kitchen seems to be a still life, painted with a sense of impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but stare, wondering when this little scene will explode.
segments.speaker: PAR
